net.munki.irc.bot

Class BotEnv

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.munki.irc.bot.BotEnv

  • public class BotEnv
extends java.lang.Object
    The public environment for the bot. This provides an API for message, command and script handlers.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BotEnv(java.lang.String[] nicks, int nickIndex, java.util.List channels, java.util.List messageListeners, java.util.List commandListeners, java.util.List replyListeners, java.util.List scriptListeners, java.io.PrintStream output)
      Creates a new bot environment.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BotEnv

        public BotEnv(java.lang.String[] nicks,
      int nickIndex,
      java.util.List channels,
      java.util.List messageListeners,
      java.util.List commandListeners,
      java.util.List replyListeners,
      java.util.List scriptListeners,
      java.io.PrintStream output)
        Creates a new bot environment.
        Parameters:
        replyListeners - The list of registered reply listeners.
        scriptListeners - The list of registered script listeners.
        nicks - An array of nicknames
        nickIndex - The index of the chosen nickname
        channels - An array of channels to join
        messageListeners - A list of message handlers
        commandListeners - A list of command handlers
        output - The output stream

      • fireIRCMessageEvent

        public void fireIRCMessageEvent(IRCMessageEvent evt)
                         throws MessageHandlerException
        Fires a message event at any registered message listeners. Message listeners are registered through the bot core.
        Parameters:
        evt - A message event
        Throws:
        MessageHandlerException - Thrown if a MessageHandler refuses to handle our message.

      • fireIRCCommandEvent

        public void fireIRCCommandEvent(IRCCommandEvent evt)
                         throws MessageHandlerException
        Fires a command event at any registered command listeners. Command listeners are registered through the bot core.
        Parameters:
        evt - A command event
        Throws:
        MessageHandlerException - Thrown if an error occurs while handling the event

      • fireIRCReplyEvent

        public void fireIRCReplyEvent(IRCReplyEvent evt)
                       throws ReplyHandlerException
        Fires a reply event at any registered reply listeners. Reply listeners are registered through the bot core.
        Parameters:
        evt - A reply event
        Throws:
        ReplyHandlerException - Thrown if an error occurs while handling the event

      • fireIRCScriptEvent

        public void fireIRCScriptEvent(IRCScriptEvent evt)
        Fires a script event at any registered script listeners. Script listeners are registered through the bot core.
        Parameters:
        evt - A script event

      • report

        public void report(java.lang.String msg)
        Outputs a message to the configured output stream.
        Parameters:
        msg - Message to report
